text: Azucena Berrutti (born 7 January 1929) is an Uruguayan politician and lawyer. She was the National Defence Minister, appointed by the Uruguayan President Tabaré Vázquez, from March 2005 until March 2008. Berrutti was born in Montevideo, Uruguay. She is a member of the Broad Front. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan lawyers Category:Politicians from Montevideo Category:Italian lawyers
title: Azucena Berrutti
